subject: Soccer
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ohio State scored four goals in a 12-minute span in the second half to defeat visiting Bradley, 4-0, and advance to the N.C.A.A. College Cup. UMass also reached the College Cup, the Final Four of men’s soccer, by defeating visiting Illinois-Chicago, 2-1.
